text: When I notice old money patterns controlling me, I recognize them and choose to rewrite them with awareness instead.
During moments when money triggers emotional reactions, I notice it and choose to respond with clarity instead.
When I feel the pull to let fear control my money decisions, I notice it and choose to think strategically instead.
I let not being able to rewrite money patterns prevent me from building a wealth mindset and controlling money effectively.
When I notice myself thinking about money strategically, I recognize it and choose to maintain those wealth mindset patterns.
I see when money decisions need clarity, and I choose to think ahead and plan strategically instead.
When I feel the urge to let emotions control money, I notice it and choose to stay calm and think ahead instead.
I let not identifying wealth mindset patterns prevent me from controlling money and thinking strategically effectively.
When I notice wealth mindset working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those strategic thinking patterns.
